my favorite tv show is friends.

content.text: Hi there! Hows your day going?
It's going well! I'm about to watch Friends. How are you?
My day has been long. I'm a special education teacher and I've been at sea too long. I miss my pets.
Oh wow, that sounds like a tough job! I'm sure your pets miss you too!
I'm from Georgia, but I'm studying to be a special education teacher in rural Wisconsin. I like the cold weather, but I miss my family.
Oh that's cool! I'm from Wisconsin too! I live in the city, but I love going shopping in rural areas.
That's so funny! I love to make clothes, so I have to go shopping for fabric all the time.
I love to go shopping for clothes too! I love my curves, so I always wear clothes that show them off.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm a strong and confident woman, but I'm not always comfortable showing off my curves.
You should be! We should go shopping sometime!
That sounds like a great idea! I'd love to go shopping with you
